title: Will There Be a PS5 Pro? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.07.23
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get PayPal Honey for free.

Tim and Blessing talk about Fortnite's new season, the possibility of PS5 outselling PS4, and whether or not there will be a PS5 pro.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:44 - “If you could only play games from 3 different companies for the rest of your life, what companies would you choose?” - Derek
00:14:26 - Housekeeping
This Friday is March 10th, so you know what that means: It's MARIO DAY! Our very own Blessing Adeoye Jr is teaming up with Retro Queen Ash-Said-Hi to bring you a Super Mario Celebration, Twitch Style. Let’s come together this Friday, March 10th on twitch.tv/twitch at 11am PT to celebrate everyone's favorite plumber / kart racer / athlete / doctor / painter / janitor, you get the idea! It's MARIO!
The Roper Report   -
00:15:13 - Fortnite Chapter 4 Season 2 release date confirmed
00:23:51 - Former Riot Execs form a new studio

00:50:19 - Playdate Announces Price Rise and Launches Digital Store With 11 New Games
00:53:44 - Neon White could be coming to Xbox
